title: Clareville Avenue Duplex 2 – Sandringham
content:
This duplex was designed as a modern, stylish home with a relaxed coastal feel. The goal was to create a bright, airy space that makes everyday living easy and enjoyable, with high-quality finishes and a smooth flow between indoor and outdoor areas.

For this project, Inhaus Living embraced a contemporary coastal aesthetic while ensuring comfort, flow, and refined detailing throughout every element of the home.

Luxe Bathroom
This stunning bathroom is all about modern luxury. The black and white freestanding bath stands out against a marble-look feature wall, with a lit-up niche and chandelier adding a touch of glamour. Clean fixtures, a glowing marble-style basin, and black tiles keep the space sleek and calm. It’s a bold, beautiful design that ties together perfectly.

Open-Plan Living
The layout was designed to make the most of space and natural light, allowing easy flow between the living, dining, and kitchen areas. Large windows and well-placed openings let sunlight in, creating a bright, warm, and open-feeling home.

Sleek Kitchen
The kitchen is both practical and stylish, connecting smoothly with the rest of the home. Marble countertops add a touch of timeless elegance.

Luxurious timbered outdoor area perfect for entertaining
The open timber outdoor area is designed for effortless entertaining. Featuring beautiful timber flooring and a covered dining space, it’s ideal for hosting gatherings in any season. Adding a touch of luxury, the built-in jacuzzi creates the perfect spot to unwind. With its inviting layout and year-round appeal, this outdoor space is sure to become a favourite for both relaxation and socialising.

The result is a contemporary home that blends style and functionality with ease. Cean lines, refined finishes, and a cohesive use of materials give the duplex a luxurious, modern feel.

Make an enquiry today with Inhaus Living.
